    def arrange_(self, d, cur_item_link, always=False):
        print(f"\n{datetime.now()}   1. Arrange_v0")
    
        if not self.current_page_is(cur_item_link):
            print(f"{datetime.now()}   => current_url != cur_item_link")
            self.link = cur_item_link
            self.open_page()
        else:
